attributes.action: REVOKE THE CURRENT TAX EXEMPTED STATUS ENJOYED BY MEMBERS OF THE CURRENT UK GOVERMENT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the special tax exemption currently enjoyed by our elected members of parliament is not acceptable, and should be revoked immediately. and require retrospective payment of all taxes due.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
